channel.title: Making a server work with bluurs client?
channel.description: well i guess i've never really messed with 317's and clients did 317 coding, then quit and came back and started on 508s. but any time i go to run a server with that client it just instantly logs me out/dc's me. NOTE: i've tried with 2 other servers. [b]any help is GREATLY appreciated.[/b]
